name: The Spotted Pig Pimm's Cup
description: Not quite a traditional recipe, but with very traditional flavors, Ryan Gannon's version is "firmed up" with Cointreau.

recipeInstructions.text: Put mint leaves, cucumber, and ice in a highball glass. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add lime juice, Cointreau, and Pimm's. Shake and strain into glass. Top with ginger ale.
